description: Well, it happened we fucked these girls to oblivion times two. It's like we found oblivion and then knocked on the door next to it, and went a little further around the bend. Kristina Rose and Casey Calvert can cum like no other two girl duo on the planet. It's their super power. We're not convinced they are human. The longest, screamingest, orgasm-y-iest orgasms came out of these two and we just held on to the machine like a novice water skier. The Squirter machines, the Fucksalls, The Sybian, The Tongue Machine, Doc Thumper and MORE - yes, MORE! No questions, this is a Hall of FuckingMachines shoot.
title: SHARK WEEK CONTINUED WITH CASEY CALVERT & KRISTINA ROSE
